recommendations.title: Optimize msw usage
recommendations.description: msw is 4.3 MB - consider tree shaking or alternatives
recommendations.implementation: Review msw imports and use specific imports instead of full library
recommendations.impact: Could reduce bundle size by 1.3 MB

recommendations.title: Bundle size monitoring
